external_references.description: Dedola, G. et al. (2023, October 12). ToddyCat: Keep calm and check logs. Retrieved January 3, 2024.

description: [ToddyCat](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1022) can determine is Kaspersky software is running on an endpoint by running `cmd /c wmic process where name="avp.exe"`.(Citation: Kaspersky ToddyCat Check Logs October 2023)
